tool_description: Powerful and user-friendly tool designed to streamline the process of obtaining accurate tax rates for specific ZIP codes across the United States. With this API, users can input a ZIP code and receive instant access to the corresponding tax rate information, ensuring compliance with local and state tax regulations.
name: Zip2Tax USA: Simplify Tax Rate Lookup
title: Zip2Tax USA: Simplify Tax Rate Lookup
tool_name: Zip2Tax USA: Simplify Tax Rate Lookup

api_list.name: RetrieveTaxRateByZIP
api_list.description: Straightforward and efficient API function that allows users to obtain precise tax rate information by providing a ZIP code as input.
